I think you have a bug here. The first image you showed us, is basically a simple way to transform a normal engine into a radial engine, like the white one in the second image. Radial engines are capable of pumping fuel "sideways", since they're on the side of the fuel tank, and it seems that radial engines pump through decouplers, which they shouldn't.

It's worth making a post in the bug/support forum to show this off, that shouldn't be happening.
